analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LoveAccountBase.withdrawConfirm (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#267-286):
	External calls:
	- BankCore(BANKACCOUNT).receiveFee.value(request_fee)() (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#281-282)
	External calls sending eth:
	- BankCore(BANKACCOUNT).receiveFee.value(request_fee)() (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#281-282)
	- withdrawer.transfer(request_amount - request_fee) (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#282-283)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- request_amount (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#284)
	- request_fee (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#285)
	- status (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#283)
	- withdrawer (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#283-284)

Bank.bankConfirm (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#484-500) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(pendingList[_conadd].amount == _amount)

Reentrancy in Bank.bankConfirm (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#484-500):
	External calls:
	- LoveAccountBase(_conadd).withdrawConfirm(_amount,msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#496-498)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pendingList (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#499)

Reentrancy in Bank.bankWithdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#457-479):
	External calls:
	- _conA.withdraw(_amount,msg.sender,_fee) (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#472-473)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pendingList (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#475-479)

Reentrancy in LoveAccountBase.breakup (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#245-254):
	External calls:
	- BankCore(BANKACCOUNT).receiveFee.value(_fee)() (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#250-251)
	External calls sending eth:
	- BankCore(BANKACCOUNT).receiveFee.value(_fee)() (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#250-251)
	- owner2.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#252)
	- owner1.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#252-253)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- status (/unique_chucks/21/0xce502a07c1a9ff240285d67910b335a8ea9edfa3.sol#253-254)
